channel.title: How to change your home area?
channel.description:
This is a question not a tutorial...just so were are clear on that :)
Could somebody please tell me how to change home area, i dont need to know how to add objects and stuff to it, i can read tuts on that, but i cant find any on how to change a home area. you can either post a nice long response, or you can direct me to a web site or other post. Tyvm

item.title: How to change your home area?
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

np, just trying help out and trying to get posts :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 10:42:43 pm[/size][hr]if u need any help with anything else just pm me

Read full topic
item.source: How to change your home area?

item.title: How to change your home area?
item.dc:creator: @0wnzageScapeOwner 0wnzageScapeOwner
item.description:
@0wnzageScapeOwner wrote:

[quote=“SkillersDream, post:2, topic:222406”]you should go into ur client.java and do ctrl+f ur see something like this, } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by SkillersDream } else { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("You teleport to Home.");
make the Cords (####) the cords u want the new home ( yours will have numbers ) to be now to make a player log in there go into player.java and do ctrl + f and search for tele and ur see soemthing like this // initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; change the #### to the cord tele’s urs will have numbers of the home in ur source already tho so just change the home area cords to the new ones.[/quote]

Thanks soo much dude ill give this a try when i deck out a new home, which i dont even know what its gonna be yet, but tyvm !

Read full topic
item.source: How to change your home area?

item.title: How to change your home area?
item.dc:creator: @SkillersDream SkillersDream
item.description:
@SkillersDream wrote:

you should go into ur client.java and do ctrl+f ur see something like this, } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by SkillersDream } else { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; sendMessage("You teleport to Home.");
make the Cords (####) the cords u want the new home ( yours will have numbers ) to be now to make a player log in there go into player.java and do ctrl + f and search for tele and ur see soemthing like this // initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; change the #### to the cord tele’s urs will have numbers of the home in ur source already tho so just change the home area cords to the new ones.

Read full topic
